chapters.title: Chapter 24: To Make a Stand
chapters.info: Marillin Gemalphin, p. 385—Aes Sedai of the Black Ajah, formerly of the Brown. She is fond of cats, and is rarely seen without one. She is skinny, has a narrow face, and a wide nose. She was captured and imprisoned in the dungeons below the Palace when Elayne raided the house in which Marillin and several other Darkfriends were staying. She recently escaped, along with Falion and Shiaine.
